channel.title: Final fantasy 7 crisis core challenges?
channel.description:
anyone have any challenges that sound challenging for final fantasy 7 crisis core post here
after 20 hours through i got pretty far i got to where you take cloud through the tunnel things from the shinra mansion in nibelheim and i got a little bored of how easy it got so im starting over (need 1 more godess materia to )
i came up with these challenges...
Only attack and Magic: you can only use magic and attack through the whole game
Only attack and sp using attacks: name explains it unless you have to use spells like at a part where you cant hit the enemy with attacking
no item using: cant use potions ethers etc
no cure, cura, curaga, etc: cant use any healing spells
no materia: no materia equipped at all (exceptions for enemys you need to use magic)
anything else you may come up with please post and ill give you credit
